The length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too long. While some it's not see-through, others find it almost see-through, and opinions on value are divided between those who think it's worth the money and those who find it overpriced. items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good buy!
items.body: I had to get the top taken in a little bit but this was a cute dress. It fit me well after the alterations, I’m about 235 lbs and got a 10-12. It has good stretch, didn’t even have to pull the zipper down to get it on. Not see through and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Kaylah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sleeves ….
items.body: The sleeves are cute on the model and are a completely different matter in reality. I tried to make this work and it just didn’t lol Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, perfect length, I have a big boost and it fits weird in that area, other than that is a perfect dress. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wine Dress
items.body: I love the dress. My husband loves it too. I ordered Small and my weight is 120lbs. I like the fit but I wish I ordered the XS so its more fitted around my lower body and the sleeve part of the dress is a little lose around my shoulders but its fine. Overall, the quality is good but I the price is too pricey and for the comfort its okay since its a beautiful sexy dress. Its a thin dress but not see through. Read more
items.author: JUSTINE BAUTISTA

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Split Formal Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Split Formal Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Navy, Black, Solid Black, Solid Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
